properties.name: Arvada Colorado Cohousing
properties.description: Posted by KsalzgeberArvada, CO, USA1 Inter-generational community Approximately 30 homes planned 1 Senior community  Approximately 28 homes planned These 2 cohousing communities will be part of a larger New Urbanist Neighborhood intended to be as close to zero energy as is feasible. The site is centrally located to Denver, Golden, Boulder, and the Mountain Areas. It is also located along the Ralston Creek bike trail with access to Denver and beyond.

properties.name: Greyrock Commons
properties.description: Posted by KsalzgeberWild Cherry Lane, Ft. Collins, CO, USAGreyrock Commons is located on 16 acres of land about three miles northwest of "Old Town" Fort Collins, Colorado. With a spectacular view of the foothills of the Rocky Mountains , beautiful gardens, and connected neighbors , Greyrock Commons does not resemble typical housing developments.

properties.name: Harmony Village Cohousing Community
properties.description: Posted by Ksalzgeber  1001 Cottonwood Circle, Golden, CO, USAThe southwest pueblo style homes of Harmony are set among mature cottonwoods and adjacent to designated open space. Wonderland Hill received a "Building Innovation for Home Ownership" award given by HUD for its work on Harmony Village. Contact John Lightburn at (303) 216-1140 for more information or visit www.harmonyvillage.org.

properties.name: Hearthstone Cohousing Community
properties.description: Posted by Ksalzgeber2000 Elitches Cir, Denver, CO, USAThe Hearthstone Cohousing Community is located within a new urbanist development focused on the redevelopment of the former Elitch Gardens amusement park. This project has been E-Star rated and is Green Built certified by the NAHB.

properties.name: Lyons Valley Village
properties.description: Posted by KsalzgeberLyons, CO, USALocated 20 minutes from Boulder and a few minutes from Rocky Mountain National Park this picturesque site is perfect for a sustainable community. It is bordered on two sides by City Parks, is adjacent to the St. Vrain River, and is a short walk from downtown Lyons. This charming community will have 18 cottage-style homes and a 2,000 sf common house.

properties.name: Washington Village
properties.description: Posted by KsalzgeberBoulder, CO, USAThe Washington Village in Boulder combines a unique vision with an outstanding site. Washington School is a 100 year old elementary school with high ceilings, extensive windows and offers exceptional views on a 3 acre site which is to be developed into a 34 unit cohousing community.

properties.name: Watercolor in the Meadow
properties.description: Posted by Ksalzgeber3470 Fantasy Place, Castle Rock, CO, USAYoull get the feeling from your first glance that youve found something very special here. Visit Village Homes at Watercolor in The Meadows At Historic Castle Rock and discover homes that really stand apart from the crowd with the enduring quality and elegant architecture of the Haven Collection. Here, you get more than luxury and comfort, but also the freedom of choice. Both in the way you can personalize your floorplan  to the special finishes available from our Distinctive Choices Studio and TECHTouch Showroom.

properties.name: Wild Sage
properties.description: Posted by Ksalzgeber1750 13th St, Boulder, CO, USAWild Sage is an infill site located in the Holiday Neighborhood in Boulder, CO. This Green Built community has many sustainable features such as wet-blown cellulose, a shared heating system with radiant heat and roughed-in solar capability. It is near open space, trails, amenities and public transportation. This community has it all.
